tool_description:
COMPLETE FORMS AND SURVEY ON MOBILE (EVEN OFFLINE) AND PLUG DATA COLLECTED TO YOUR SYSTEM WITH OUR API.

------------------------------------------
Create and publish your forms and surveys on Datafield mobile application for iPhone, iPad and Android and start collecting on site data in real time. Datafield's mobile form builder is trusted by small, medium and large corporation worldwide
name: Datafield
title: Datafield

api_list.name: Create a team
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-datafield.p.rapidapi.com/apis/v1/teams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-datafield.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: *Get Token
api_list.description: A token is mandatory to call an API successfully. The provided user must be an account admin.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-datafield.p.rapidapi.com/apis/v1/tokens"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
